title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: S-twist warp, S-twist weft 
Technique: slit tapestry
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 5.8 x 6 cm (2 5/16 x 2 3/8 in.)
description: Red woven square with a white linear and geomentric border and a multicolored medallion in the center.  The medallion depicts a charioteer within a pearl roundel border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment. Medium: S-twist warp, S-twist weft 
Technique: slit tapestry. 1951-100-1.
